sentences.en: From the Terrace, Charade, Lord of the Rings, Spiderman.
sentences.cn: Terrace, Charade, 指环王, 蜘蛛侠.

sentences.en: He wasn't really upset — his behaviour was just a charade.
sentences.cn: 他并不是真正心绪烦乱——他的行为只是荒谬的伪装.

sentences.en: His poems, despite their dignity and felicity, have an air of charade.
sentences.cn: 他的诗篇虽然庄严巧妙, 却有猜迷之嫌.

sentences.en: How much longer must we sustain this charade?
sentences.cn: 我们还得忍受那个猜字谜的游戏多久?

sentences.en: I refused to go along with their pathetic charade.
sentences.cn: 我拒不跟他们摆出那副可悲的装模作样的姿态.

sentences.en: I think your charade is all played out.
sentences.cn: 我想你的哑谜游戏已经被大家看穿了.

sentences.en: I wondered why he had gone through the elaborate charade.
sentences.cn: 我不明白，他为什么要大费周章，装腔作势。

sentences.en: She struggled to maintain the charade of not being afraid.
sentences.cn: 她竭力装出不害怕的样子.

sentences.en: So after this whole charade, you didn't sleep with her?
sentences.cn: 就是说, 你辛苦伪装了那么久却没和她上床?

sentences.en: So we play out this charade of happy families and most of the time life trundles along much as before, more or less happily.
sentences.cn: 因此我们维持着这字谜般的快乐家庭，大部分时候生活与以前没什么不同地——多多少少快乐地—— 向前滚动着。

sentences.en: Their whole marriage had a charade ─ they had never loved each other.
sentences.cn: 他们的整个婚姻都是在做戏他们从未相爱过.

sentences.en: Their whole marriage had been a charade—they had never loved each other.
sentences.cn: 他们的整个婚姻都是在做戏—他们从未相爱过。

sentences.en: Were they not equally fault for perpetrating a giant charade that bound to end in tears?
sentences.cn: 难道他们不应该同样对此负责? 他们参与的规模巨大的数字游戏注定酿成泪水和痛苦.

sentences.en: Why would anyone put up with a charade?
Yossarian was unmoved by the fustian charade of the burial ceremony ( Joseph Heller )
sentences.cn: 约萨仁丝毫不为葬礼上浮夸的象征性仪式所激动 ( 约瑟夫赫勒 )

sentences.en: You must not refine too much upon this charade.
sentences.cn: 你切不可过分推敲这个字谜.

trans.tran_cn: 易识破的伪装，看手势猜字谜游戏，哑剧字谜
trans.tran_en: a game in which one person uses actions and no words to show the meaning of a word or phrase, and other people have to guess what it is
